translation.en: - - You saw the witch and you survived.

translation.ja: 〝ナイトウィング･ キャンプ場〞 ７月12日 1978年の夏だった ７月12日 1978年の夏だった
〝ナイトウィング･ キャンプ場〞 キャンプ初日よ

translation.en: Only Cindy Berman would expect to clean the outhouse and not get dirty.
translation.ja: シンディ･バーマンは トイレ掃除でパニック

translation.en: - Who are you? - Nick Goode. Nice to meet you.
translation.ja: 何者なの？ ニック･グッドだ

translation.en: Deep down, you feel it, don't you?
Bad things always happen to Shadysiders.

translation.ja: 住民に憑(と)りついてきた

translation.en: Mary… she tried to kill him.
translation.ja: だからメアリーは 彼を殺そうとした

translation.en: We have to find a way out.
The curse will last until body and hand unite.
translation.ja: “体と手がひとつになるまで 呪いが終わることはない”
シェイディサイドを救う

translation.en: We have to bury this thing… right fucking now.
translation.ja: 今すぐ これを埋めないと

translation.en: - Where is she? The body? - I don't know.
translation.ja: 体はどこ？ 分からない

translation.en: We know where the body is, so all we need is the hand.
translation.ja: 体はあるから あとは手よ

translation.en: Is it still buried under the Hanging Tree?
translation.ja: 縛り首の木の下にある？

translation.en: I feel it. It's fighting to get out.
translation.ja: つかんだけど出たがらない

translation.en: We're going to lose her. We're going to lose both.
Don't go wobbly on me now, Henry.
- On three, all right? - All right.
Seven piglets. And not a stillborn among them.
translation.ja: ７匹の子豚を 無事に取り上げた

translation.en: Luck and a very sharp knife.
translation.ja: それとナイフのおかげ

translation.en: This wicked one is going to Solomon.
- He's lucky to have a friend like you. - Father…
translation.ja: 運のいい奴だ 父さん

translation.en: First his child, then his wife. He needs someone to take care of him.
translation.ja: 妻子を亡くした男は 世話してやるべきだ
強くて才能ある者がな

translation.en: I'm not marrying Solomon bloody Goode, if that's what you're driving at.
translation.ja: ソロモン･グッドとは 結婚しない

translation.en: I worry about you. Is it so wrong for a father to wish his daughter to wed?
translation.ja: 父親が娘の結婚を 願って悪いか？

translation.en: And leave you alone to eat up all the bacon?
translation.ja: 父さんを独りにできない

translation.en: A full moon rises before nightfall.
translation.ja: 満月は日暮れ前に昇る

translation.en: Good night to enjoy the fruits of the land.
translation.ja: 夜は大地の実りを楽しもう

translation.en: A full moon rises before nightfall.
translation.ja: 満月は日暮れ前に昇る

translation.en: A good night to enjoy the fruits of the land.
translation.ja: 夜は大地の実りを楽しもう

translation.en: Try to clean yourself up before then.
♪ Pastor Miller, blind as a bat ♪
translation.ja: ミラー牧師は目が見えない

translation.en: ♪ Pastor Miller, blind as a bat! ♪
translation.ja: ミラー牧師は目が見えない

translation.en: ♪ Tried to read the Bible And his eyes went splat! ♪
translation.ja: 聖書を開いたら目が潰れた

translation.en: Oh, but I see you. I've got eyes in the back of my head!
translation.ja: だが君たちは見える 頭の後ろに目があるぞ

translation.en: - Don't be a brat, Constance! - Don't be a shrew, Abigail!
translation.ja: コンスタンス！ アビゲイル

translation.en: A full moon rises before nightfall.
translation.ja: 満月は日暮れ前に昇る

translation.en: Good night to enjoy fruits of the land.
translation.ja: 夜は大地の実りを楽しもう

translation.en: You tell Mother and I'll cut your braids off your head.
translation.ja: 言ったら三つ編みを切る

translation.en: Don't be getting us into trouble. You know what Mother will do.
translation.ja: 問題ばかり起こさないで

translation.en: A full moon rises before nightfall.
translation.ja: 満月は日暮れ前に昇る

translation.en: Holy Hannah Miller? Don't tell me you're going.
translation.ja: ハンナ･ミラー あなたも行くの？

translation.en: In fact, I'm going with Lizzie before to get berries from the widow.
translation.ja: リジーと一緒に 未亡人の所へも

translation.en: Hannah, it's one thing for Lizzie to trade with that hag.
translation.ja: リジーが行っても 驚かないけど

translation.en: It's another for the pastor's daughter.
translation.ja: あなたは牧師の娘でしょ

translation.en: Aren't you even a little curious?
I'll only go if you go.
Girl, what's taking so long? I need help with…
translation.ja: いつまでかかるの こっちも…

translation.en: I can see a secret about you, girl.
And a good day to you, Thomas.
translation.ja: こんにちは　トーマス

translation.en: Don't you want to hear it,
I see all the dark secrets in Union.
translation.ja: ユニオンの暗い秘密が

translation.en: I see the darkness in you, girl!
It's too much. I can't accept it.
Just think of it as my dowry.
We're practically married. Haven't you heard?
translation.ja: 私たち 結婚するみたい

translation.en: Well, in that case, tell your father this isn't nearly worth it.
translation.ja: それには不足だと お父さんに伝えて

translation.en: - But thank you, truly. - Of course.
translation.ja: でも助かるよ いいのよ

translation.en: Shadows fall on us all now and then.
translation.ja: 誰の上にも影は落ちる

translation.en: My brother wants me to give up.
translation.ja: もう諦めろと言われたよ

translation.en: He says the Goode family are not farmers.
translation.ja: グッドは農家じゃないそうだ

translation.en: But these lands, they are fertile. I know it.
translation.ja: でもこの土地は豊かだ 僕には分かる

translation.en: We'll have a healthy crop yet.
The sun will shine on us.

translation.ja: サラ･フィアーの褒め言葉か

translation.en: Well, I'm going to lose light. I should go.
translation.ja: 暗くなる前に帰らないと
満月は日暮れ前に昇る

translation.en: Nothing good comes from those woods after sundown.
translation.ja: 日暮れ後の森は危険だ

translation.en: Shouldn't you be sleeping? Father wouldn't approve.
translation.ja: 姉さんこそ　父さんが怒る

translation.en: The berries make you see the world beyond our own. Just one bite.
translation.ja: ベリーを食べれば 世界が広がる

translation.en: What does an old lady need with that?
She's not just an old lady.
The widow's 1,000 years old. She drinks the blood of virgins to keep her youth.
translation.ja: 未亡人は1000歳よ 乙女の血で若さを保つ

translation.en: She sacrificed her husband to become the Devil's bride. That's how she gained eternal life.
translation.ja: 夫を捧げて悪魔と契(ちぎ)り 永遠の命を得た

translation.en: Well, I heard she kept the company of the natives, and that she even fell in love with one.
translation.ja: 先住民と行動を共にし 恋に落ちたと聞いた

translation.en: She learned their medicine too. Solomon told me.
translation.ja: ソロモンの話では 医術も学んだとか

translation.en: He took his wife to her after they lost their child, but it was too late.
translation.ja: 彼も奥さんを診せたけど 手遅れだったそうよ

translation.en: Are you sure this is the right way? How do you know where we're going?
translation.ja: 本当にこの道？ そもそも知ってるの？

translation.en: I've been there before. Remember when Abigail had her ring of fire?
translation.ja: 前にも行った アビゲイルの性病の時よ

translation.en: She was scratching like a dog during Father's sermon.
translation.ja: 犬みたいに かきむしってた

translation.en: Mother told me she'd lain with a demon. The Devil's gift.
translation.ja: 悪魔と交わって 贈り物をもらったとか
マッド･トーマスからよ

translation.en: Well, whoever she lay with, Abbi made me go to the widow with her.
translation.ja: とにかく彼女に付き添ったの

translation.en: - And the widow fixed her with witchcraft? - Yes, witchcraft.
translation.ja: 未亡人が魔術で治した？ 魔術ね

translation.en: And some foul- smelling paste made for whores like Abbi Berman.
translation.ja: それに変なにおいの塗り薬も

translation.en: The veil has grown thin with the turn of the moon.
translation.ja: 月が動いて覆いが薄れる

translation.en: And with it, the Morning Star rises.
translation.ja: すると明けの明星が昇るわ

translation.en: Beware the Devil. He lives in that book. He calls to you from it.
translation.ja: 本の中から呼びかける悪魔に 用心しなさい

translation.en: He senses you now. And if you're not careful,
translation.ja: 気づかれたから油断しないで

translation.en: he'll bore himself beneath your skin
translation.ja: さもないと悪魔が 肌の下に潜り込み

translation.en: and he'll consume you from the inside out.
translation.ja: あなたを内側からむさぼる

translation.en: To the fruits of the land.
- - Come to the woods with me.
Sarah Fier, you want a kiss too?
translation.ja: お前もキスしてほしい？

translation.en: You know, maybe if you weren't such a frigid bitch--
translation.ja: してやってもいいが 不感症のメス犬は…

translation.en: And if you're still so eager,
I'm sure there's a mule tied up who will overlook your flaws in the dark.
translation.ja: 欠点を見逃してくれる ラバとするのね

translation.en: No… I'm just not afraid with you.
translation.ja: あなたがいれば 怖くないだけよ

translation.en: Tell me to stop and I shall.
translation.ja: 嫌なら そう言って

translation.en: Someone was there. Someone saw us.
What if it was the widow or Caleb?
translation.ja: 未亡人かケイレブかも

translation.en: Caleb can barely find his own member.
translation.ja: 自分のナニも見失う男よ

translation.en: But if he saw us, if he tells--
translation.ja: もし言いふらされたら…

translation.en: That spoiled piglet doesn't scare me.
translation.ja: あんな奴 怖くない

translation.en: Well, let them hang us then.
I was not alive before now anyway.
translation.ja: 初めて生きてる感じがする
脅かさないで　メリーボーイ

translation.en: You've overslept. I've done most of the morning work.
translation.ja: 朝の仕事は僕がやった
メリーボーイ　ごはんよ
ハンナ 心臓が止まるかと思った

translation.en: There's something wrong with my father.
The voice shall sing. Order's furnace beckons now.
translation.ja: 声が歌い 教団のかまどが招く

translation.en: To be freed, to be released.
He's distracted, listening to things only he can hear.
translation.ja: 心ここにあらずで 幻聴に応答してる
そうじゃない　何かが…

translation.en: I look in his eyes and it's as if…
As if something crawled in from the night and put on Father's skin.
translation.ja: 別の何かが 父の皮をかぶってるみたい

translation.en: Mother's gone to the meeting house.
She says we must ask God,
translation.ja: 神に祈るべきだと言うけど

translation.en: but I don't know which Psalm,
translation.ja: 神に祈るべきだと言うけど どの一節を唱えればいいのか
どの一節を唱えればいいのか
医者に診せたほうがいい

translation.en: - I will talk to your mother. - No!
She can't know you were here.
I'm not to see you anymore.

translation.ja: 父さんが おかしくなったのも… 父さんが おかしくなったのも… 〝近親相姦 男色 獣姦〞
父さんが おかしくなったのも… 〝近親相姦 男色 獣姦〞

translation.en: You won't stop until you've completely ruined her life, will you?
translation.ja: 娘の人生を 台なしにしたいの？

translation.en: Thomas saw you last night in town!
translation.ja: トーマスが見たって 言いふらしてる

translation.en: He's telling everyone! How dare you bring this filth into our home!
translation.ja: トーマスが見たって 言いふらしてる アバズレを家に入れないで

translation.en: I see what you really are, girl.
An abomination corrupting my daughter. Born of perversion!
translation.ja: 娘を堕落させる気だね あんたは汚れた子だ
ミラーさん　やめて

translation.en: God knows what you are, girl!
You'd better pray for mercy on your damned soul!
translation.ja: 堕落した魂の 赦(ゆる)しを請うんだね

translation.en: Sarah, Thomas has been talking. There something you want to tell me?
translation.ja: サラ　トーマスが 言いふらしてる 話したいことは？

translation.en: I heard you come home late last night.
translation.ja: 昨夜は帰りが遅かった

translation.en: You were out with the pastor's daughter, weren't you?
translation.ja: 牧師の娘と出かけたのか
アビゲイルとリジーも 一緒だった

translation.en: If your mother was still alive…
You know, it was your mother who convinced us to settle this land.
translation.ja: 母さんが この土地を選んだんだ

translation.en: She was wise enough to understand this land was special.
translation.ja: 特別な場所だと 感じてたからだ

translation.en: She said she could feel it in the air.
translation.ja: 空気に感じると言ってた

translation.en: and made up our own Eden here.
And I fear in her absence… I have failed her.
translation.ja: 彼女がいなくなって 俺は期待を裏切った

translation.en: There has always been a strangeness in you, Sarah. A streak…
translation.ja: 昔からお前の中には 異質なものがあった

translation.en: Something perhaps a mother could have rooted out,
translation.ja: 母親なら芽を摘んだだろうが

translation.en: but you were raised like a boy. I gave you too much freedom,
translation.ja: お前は男の子のように育ち 俺も甘やかした

translation.en: and now it is too late.
to harvest the bitter fruit of the evil we have sown.
translation.ja: 我々が育てた邪悪の実を 刈り取る

translation.en: blind to the horrors around us.
translation.ja: 身近な恐怖に目をつぶる

translation.en: But you see it now, don't you?
translation.ja: 今なら君にも分かるだろ

translation.en: He blocks our well, clogs it with our sin.
translation.ja: 井戸は塞がれ 我々の罪が栓をする

translation.en: He takes our water. He takes our life blood!

translation.ja: みんな集まって どうしたの？

translation.en: - What's going on here? - The bucket's caught on something.
translation.ja: みんな集まって どうしたの？ 桶(おけ)が引っかかった

translation.en: A dead dog in the well!
- Get it out! - Our water! It's poisoned!
translation.ja: 取り出せ 井戸が汚された

translation.en: See? You have already drunk from the cup of darkness.
translation.ja: すでに闇を飲んでいる

translation.en: This is the work of the Devil. He has come to stake our land.
translation.ja: この土地に巣食う 悪魔の仕業だ

translation.en: Who among you has welcomed the Devil to Union?
and cast his darkness over us.
And his darkness grows within each of us
translation.ja: おのおのの心で闇は育つ

translation.en: I didn't mean to stop by unexpected.
translation.ja: 突然 訪ねたりして すまないが

translation.en: And that's when I saw something in the trees.
translation.ja: 森の中で何かを見たの

translation.en: I don't know. It was so dark.
I thought it was Caleb or… or the widow.
translation.ja: たぶんケイレブか未亡人かと

translation.en: and the pastor is sick and…
translation.ja: 牧師は病気だし 私もおかしくなりそう

translation.en: and I feel half mad, and now I wonder
translation.ja: 牧師は病気だし 私もおかしくなりそう もしかしたら原因は 私にあるのかもしれない

translation.en: if perhaps something is wrong with me.
translation.ja: もしかしたら原因は 私にあるのかもしれない

translation.en: - Sarah-- - And always has been, Solomon.
I was never normal. My own father said so.
Maybe I was born wicked and strange.
translation.ja: 生まれつき邪悪で 異常なんだとしたら？

translation.en: Maybe it was the Devil in the woods.
translation.ja: 森の悪魔を見たのかも

translation.en: Maybe the Devil is in me.
Stop! You sound like Mad Thomas.
Thomas is a mindless drunk, nothing more.
translation.ja: 奴は酔いどれの廃人だ

translation.en: Look around, Solomon. There is blight everywhere.
translation.ja: でも私は荒廃に囲まれてる

translation.en: I… I… I grant you that, but you…
Hannah was just a dalliance, Sarah.
translation.ja: ハンナとのことは ただの戯(たわむ)れだろ

translation.en: Because it was not just a dalliance.
translation.ja: ただの戯れじゃなかった
戯れじゃなかったとしても

translation.en: one does not summon the Devil by chance.
translation.ja: 偶然 悪魔は呼べない

translation.en: Even the weakest heart, the most corruptible soul,
translation.ja: どんなに弱くて 堕落しやすい魂でも⸺

translation.en: they must make the choice. They must extend their hand,
translation.ja: 自ら手を伸ばさないと無理だ

translation.en: You can always come to me, Sarah.
My door is always open to you.

translation.ja: コンスタンス　どこなの？

translation.en: - The Devil has locked himself in there! - Pastor! Pastor!
translation.ja: 悪魔が閉じこもった 牧師！　開けてくれ
どうなってる 牧師が集会所に 子供たちを閉じ込めた

translation.en: He's locked the children in the Meeting House. A dozen at least.
translation.ja: 牧師が集会所に 子供たちを閉じ込めた

translation.en: Because they are. We call upon which they call within.
translation.ja: 我々は内なる声に 耳を傾けるだけだ

translation.en: - Where's my husband? - Hold them back!
- Let me go! Let me go! Cyrus! - Constance!
translation.ja: 中に入れてちょうだい コンスタンス

translation.en: I can see now. I can see everything.
translation.ja: 私には すべてが見える
静粛に　聞いてくれ

translation.en: - - There is a dark and evil force at work here.
translation.ja: 闇と邪悪な力が 町に紛れ込んだ

translation.en: If we are ever to end this misery… Aye!
…then we must root out the guilty.
- We must-- - Jakob! Please, Goodman Berman!
translation.ja: ジェイコブ　聞いてくれ
悲劇をもたらした者は死んだ
ミラー牧師だ 我々の牧師は 神に仕える人だった

translation.en: Our pastor was a man of God.
translation.ja: 我々の牧師は 神に仕える人だった

translation.en: - Right. - And this was not him!
- He was possessed by a darkness. - Yes!
translation.ja: 闇に憑りつかれたせいだ

translation.en: My child, my dear Constance, and many others…
translation.ja: だから愛娘のコンスタンスや 大勢の子供が⸺

translation.en: …many of our entire bloodlines have been stolen from us.
translation.ja: 我々の大事な血脈が断たれた

translation.en: I saw some little lambs of our town…
translation.ja: 満月の夜 この町の子羊たちが⸺

translation.en: laughing, dallying on the full moon last!
translation.ja: 戯れているのを見たぞ

translation.en: There were some of us in the woods, but there was no…
translation.ja: 確かに森に集まったが…

translation.en: We drank Apple Jack. We danced.
translation.ja: 酒を飲んで踊っただけだ

translation.en: We are young. That is not a crime!
translation.ja: 若者の権利だ　罪じゃない

translation.en: You have sinned! You have sinned!
For they will bear the Devil's mark!
But just as my brother Solomon
heroically expelled the darkness among us by killing our afflicted pastor,
translation.ja: 勇敢にも病んだ牧師を殺し 町から闇をはらってくれた

translation.en: we too will punish and surmount this evil!
translation.ja: 我々もこの手で 悪を退治するぞ

translation.en: As survivors, our faces always will remain toward the sun.
translation.ja: この闘いに勝てば我々は 常に太陽を仰ぎ見られる

translation.en: I traced it on my patrol!
This scourge centers on Union proper.
translation.ja: この惨劇は ユニオンを中心に起きている

translation.en: I've searched the woods. It does not extend beyond the settlement.
translation.ja: 町の境界の外に 害は及んでない
罪人はユニオンにいる

translation.en: We are being punished, and I have a list of names!
translation.ja: 町は罰されているのだ 俺は罪人を知っている

translation.en: Oh, then show it to us! Show it to us!

translation.ja: いい加減にしろ 本気で言ってるのか？
実体のない影を追い 呪いを空想している

translation.en: I ask… do you have proof?
translation.ja: 君に聞くが 証拠はあるのか

translation.en: It was some nights back when the full moon had risen just beside the sun.
translation.ja: 何日か前 満月が昇り 太陽と並んだばかりの時刻だ

translation.en: She witched me and led me to the woods.
translation.ja: 俺に魔術をかけ 森に誘い出した
赤いラバに乗っていた

translation.en: - The red mule became a horned man. -
translation.ja: ラバは角の生えた男になり

translation.en: And she made me watch as she lay with the Devil.
translation.ja: 女は目の前で悪魔と交わった

translation.en: As both of them lay with the Devil.
translation.ja: ２人とも悪魔と交わっていた
ハンナ･ミラーと サラ･フィアー

translation.en: I saw Hannah Miller and Sarah Fier.
- I saw Sarah Fier. - I saw Sarah Fier.
translation.ja: サラを見た サラを見た

translation.en: - We need to get away from here! - And go where?
translation.ja: 逃げないと どこへ？

translation.en: Here! They're here! Witches over here!
translation.ja: いたぞ　魔女どもだ

translation.en: The Devil is in this disgusting whore!  No!
translation.ja: このアバズレの中に 悪魔がいる

translation.en: As sure as the sun rises, we will purge Union of this…
translation.ja: 日が昇ればユニオンから こいつらを一掃する

translation.en: We will search every house, every inch of wood!
translation.ja: すべての家を探して 森の隅々まで調べる

translation.en: We will not rest and we will not have mercy!
translation.ja: 手は休めないし 手加減もしない

translation.en: So help me, God, we will be cleansed of these anathemas!
translation.ja: 神の力を借りて この町を浄化する

translation.en: - Yeah! - We will have our justice!
translation.ja: そうだ 正義を果たす
サラ･フィアーを捜すぞ

translation.en: I did, there's no one there.
Did you hear that? The other side of the house.
translation.ja: 聞こえたか？　反対側だ

translation.en: Take your musket round back to the Fier house.
translation.ja: 銃を持ってフィアーの家へ

translation.en: Keep an eye on George Fier.
Keep an eye out for that witch.
translation.ja: 魔女が戻るかもしれん

translation.en: What have they done to you?
I am to hang on the morrow.
translation.ja: 夜が明けたら縛り首になる

translation.en: And if you don't flee, you will too.
translation.ja: 見つかればあなたもよ

translation.en: - No, I won't leave you. - You must!
translation.ja: 一緒にいる 逃げるのよ

translation.en: - No. - I led the Devil here.
translation.ja: 違う 悪魔を呼んだ

translation.en: That is not how it works. You do not summon the Devil by chance.
translation.ja: 誰も偶然に 悪魔を呼び出したりしない

translation.en: You have to make a choice.
It doesn't matter if we did it or not.
translation.ja: 事実なんて関係ないの

translation.en: They think we're guilty, so we are.
translation.ja: 疑われたら それで最後よ

translation.en: So what difference does it make if we do now?
- What are you saying? - I will go back to the widow.
translation.ja: 何の話？ 未亡人に会う

translation.en: I will make a deal with the Devil.
translation.ja: 悪魔と契約を結ぶのよ

translation.en: But the Devil… Are you mad?
translation.ja: 悪魔と契約？ どうかしてる

translation.en: Hannah, I fear the neighbor who would accuse me.
translation.ja: 本当に怖いのは 私を魔女だと責める隣人

translation.en: I fear the mother that would let her daughter hang.
translation.ja: 娘を縛り首にさせる母親よ

translation.en: They lead us like lambs to the slaughter and expect us to just follow.
translation.ja: 子羊のように殺されろと 私たちに強いる
サラ･フィアー　出てこい

translation.en: When this is over, we will leave this place.
translation.ja: すべてが終わったら この町を出る

translation.en: and we'll dance every night, then kiss in the broad daylight.
translation.ja: 毎晩 踊って 太陽を浴びながらキスする

translation.en: I will give them a witch.
- Elijah, I said enough! - Please, you have to help me!
translation.ja: イライジャ　帰れ 手を貸して

translation.en: Hannah and I, we didn't do this!
- You're bleeding. - It doesn't matter. Listen to me.
translation.ja: 血が いいから聞いて

translation.en: I went back to the woods, to the widow.
translation.ja: 未亡人に会いに行ったの

translation.en: - Sarah! - She's dead, Solomon! Someone killed her!
translation.ja: 死んでた　誰かが殺したのよ

translation.en: with a… a kind of instruction, an incantation.
translation.ja: 指示というか 呪文が書かれてた
呪文の本か？ 何の呪文だ

translation.en: I think someone struck a deal with the Devil.
translation.ja: 悪魔と契約を結んだ人がいる
きっと魔力と交換したのよ
ソロモン 急いで隠れろ

translation.en: There's no one here but me.
Do not try to intimidate me, Caleb. I am not some child!
translation.ja: 脅してもムダだ 子供じゃないぞ

translation.en: If only your word was enough, Solomon.
What's in the back room, Solomon?
Sarah Fier! Come out, Sarah Fier!
translation.ja: サラ･フィアー　出てこい

translation.en: If there's nothing there, let me check.
What do you have to hide?
I'll tell you once more. There's no one here, but me.
translation.ja: もう一度 言う ここにいるのは僕だけだ

translation.en: Sarah Fier! Go around the back! She's gotta be here somewhere!
translation.ja: 裏へ回れ この辺にいるはずだ

translation.en: Leave immediately, or I'll make you leave.
translation.ja: 力ずくで出ていかせるぞ

translation.en: Only I've grown tired of watching fortune turn a blind eye to me.
translation.ja: ツキに見放されるのに うんざりしただけだ

translation.en: How could I what? Take what we all want?
translation.ja: 望みをかなえて悪いか？

translation.en: What we all came here for?

translation.ja: 力と繁栄 栄光をつかむためだ

translation.en: what no amount of praying could ever bring.
translation.ja: 祈りでは得られないものだ

translation.en: One person every few years seems a small price to pay.
translation.ja: 数年に一度 誰か１人が小さな代償を払う
牧師は12人も殺したのよ
弟や無実の子供たちを 無実？
隣人たちが君を追ってる
君を見捨てて呪いを吐く
無知と恐怖が支配する世界だ

translation.en: Yet you resign yourself to it!
translation.ja: そんな世界に 屈するつもりか？

translation.en: They're afraid because they know you're different.
translation.ja: 君が異質だから 人々は恐れる

translation.en: Someone who refuses to settle for the rules of these dogmatists,
translation.ja: 独断的なルールに 従うのを拒絶して⸺

translation.en: who seeks more from the world.
- Stop it! Stop, stop, stop! - No, no!
Please, do not make me hurt you! I love you, Sarah! I love you!
translation.ja: 傷つけたくない 君を愛してるんだ

translation.en: Stop fighting! I don't want to hurt--

translation.ja: 魔術を使った罰として⸺

translation.en: Confess your sins or burn in eternal hell.
translation.ja: 地獄の業火で焼かれるぞ

translation.en: - No! She's lying! - I walked with the Devil!
translation.ja: ウソよ 私は悪魔と歩いた
ハンナは無実よ 解放しろ
真実はいずれ明るみに出る

translation.en: The truth shall be your curse.
translation.ja: 真実があなたの呪いとなる

translation.en: It will follow you for eternity.

translation.ja: 永遠にあなたに影を落とす

translation.en: I will show them what you've done.
We can't just leave her here,
translation.ja: このままにはできない
こんな木の下に 独りぼっちなんて

translation.en: Let's move her, bury her somewhere else.
So no one else knows where she is.

translation.ja: 我々だけ 〝魔女は永遠に生きる〞 〝魔女は永遠に生きる〞

translation.en: The truth shall be your curse.
translation.ja: 真実があなたの呪いとなる

translation.en: I will shadow you for eternity.
And everything you take and everyone you harm,
translation.ja: 何かを奪い 誰かを傷つけるたびに⸺

translation.en: you will feel the grip of my hand.
translation.ja: あなたは私の手を感じるはず

translation.en: I will show them what you've done.
I will never let you go.
translation.ja: 決してあなたを 自由にしない

translation.en: Uh… Uh, no, sir. I'm good over here.

translation.ja: 君の姉さんは混乱してる

translation.en: His dad and his grandpa and his great grandpa!
translation.ja: 代々 継承してるのよ

translation.en: She's clearly suffering from some kind of a…
I was back in time. I was Sarah Fier, and Sarah Fier was innocent.
translation.ja: 過去を見たの サラは無実だった

translation.en: She isn't turning people in Shadyside into killers. She wasn't a witch!
translation.ja: 殺人を犯させてない 魔女じゃないのよ

translation.en: We have a 5150 in possession of car 961.
translation.ja: 961号車の強奪犯は 精神疾患あり

translation.en: - Suspects on their way. - Josh! Listen! Solomon Goode--
translation.ja: 961号車の強奪犯は 精神疾患あり ソロモン･グッドよ

translation.en: made a deal with the Devil, then framed Sarah to cover his own Puritan ass.
translation.ja: 彼が悪魔と契約し サラに罪を着せた

translation.en: The Goodes, they're trading us. People from Shadyside.
translation.ja: シェイディサイドの住民を 生贄(いけにえ)にしてる
ルシファー　サマエル サタン

translation.en: - Goode gives a name to the Devil. - Ryan Torres.
translation.ja: グッドが名指し… ライアン･トーレス

translation.en: - The Devil takes over that person. - Ryan!
translation.ja: 悪魔が憑りつく ライアン

translation.en: Then that person kills and murders.
translation.ja: その人物が殺人を犯す

translation.en: And the Devil feeds on this blood of dead Shadysiders.
translation.ja: 悪魔は死者の血をすすり

translation.en: And Goode gets whatever he wants.

translation.ja: 〝グッドが再選される〞 弟は市長になった

translation.en: All of Sunnyvale gets better and better.
translation.ja: サニーヴェイルは昇り…
シェイディサイドは沈む

translation.en: And the Goodes do it over and over, again and again.
translation.ja: グッド家の人間が繰り返し

translation.en: One Goode from every generation passing down the evil.
translation.ja: 父から息子へと 悪を継承してる
その息子 アイザック･ミルトン
第一子が継承する ハリー･ルーカー

translation.en: - Abbadon, Ahriman… - Right to Sheriff Nick Goode.
translation.ja: アバドン ニック･グッドまで

translation.en: - So, Sarah Fier-- - He framed her!
translation.ja: サラ･フィアーは… ハメられた

translation.en: She's the only one who's ever figured out the truth…
translation.ja: 彼女が唯一 真実をつかんだ

translation.en: And the killers came after us to keep us from uncovering it.
translation.ja: 秘密を守るために 僕たちを襲わせた

translation.en: Yes, to protect Goode's deal with the Devil.
translation.ja: 悪魔との契約を守るため

translation.en: If the killers were after us before…
now that we know the truth, now we know about Goode's deal…
translation.ja: 今はグッドの契約を知ってる

translation.en: Look at her! I told you it wouldn't work! There's no ending it.
translation.ja: 見なさいよ やっぱり終わりはない

translation.en: Thank you, King of Sunnyvale, for rescuing poor helpless Shadysider me!
translation.ja: シェイディサイドの小娘に お情けをどうも

translation.en: This is how we save Sam.
Nick Goode. Nice to meet you.
translation.ja: ニック･グッドだ　よろしく

translation.en: Being the heir apparent isn't always easy either.
translation.ja: 名家の息子も楽じゃない

translation.en: What if that's not who I want to be?
You believe me, right? About the curse?
translation.ja: 呪いのこと信じるよね？

translation.en: I've let a lot of people die…
- Nick, this isn't your fault. - But not you. I'm not letting you die.
translation.ja: 違うよ 君は死なせない

translation.en: We need to kill Nick Goode.
But I called him… I thought…
translation.ja: 彼に電話した　てっきり…
ここを出るよ　急いで

translation.en: I wanted to do that all day.
- Should be up here on the right. - Are we sure about this?
translation.ja: この先の右だ 本気なの？

translation.en: ♪ Mo murda, mo murda, come again…♪
translation.ja: “マーティン･ フランクリン”

translation.en: You gotta be kidding me. Yo, man, I wasn't doing nothing.
translation.ja: 冗談だろ　俺は何もしてない

translation.en: Wanna help us kill Sheriff Goode?
As the mall's lead custodial engineer, I ensure that all retail establishments
translation.ja: モールの 管理エンジニアとして⸺
安全対策に力を入れた

translation.en: This is the Cadillac of store gates.
Now, the 250 prevents your standard smash- and- grab, graffiti,
translation.ja: これなら落書きもされないし

translation.en: all while complying with the 70% visibility ordinance. Best part…
And we can rig them for quick release?
Little grease, these things go down faster than a Sunnyvale cheerleader.
translation.ja: 潤滑油を塗れば チアリーダーより速い

translation.en: So, Deena is the target now,
so the killers will go after Deena's blood just like they did with Sam.
translation.ja: 殺人鬼は ディーナの血をたどる

translation.en: And then we use that to lure them into the stores, and then…
translation.ja: 餌をまいて 店に誘い込んだら…

translation.en: The killers will be locked up, then it's us versus Goode.
translation.ja: 殺人鬼が片づけば グッドと戦う

translation.en: OK, sure, awesome, but then what?
Like how do we take out Goode?
Once they're down, how quickly can we get the gates back open?
translation.ja: ゲートを再び 開けるまでの時間は？

translation.en: - Depends, but-- - Why would we want to do that?
translation.ja: 場合による 何のため？

translation.en: Look at this dumbass thing. It's bigger than a tape deck.
translation.ja: カセットデッキよりデカい

translation.en: If you want to hear more than one album, you got to carry all that too.
translation.ja: ＣＤを何枚も携帯すれば かさばるし

translation.en: It skips if you breathe on it.
Then listen to the radio, dude. We have a situation here.
translation.ja: ラジオを聴けよ 事態は深刻なんだ

translation.en: Yeah, about that, Urkel. Um… what's really going on here?
translation.ja: その件だが どういうことか説明しろ
そうか　なるほどね

translation.en: Cool. There's a half- possessed tied- up white girl.
translation.ja: 憑りつかれた白人女か

translation.en: I need you to stay calm, alright? I promise we got this all under control.
translation.ja: 心配いらないよ 彼女は大丈夫だ

translation.en: - OK. - She's one of them, we'll save her.
translation.ja: そうか 今はこうだが救える

translation.en: We're gonna kill Sheriff Goode and save Shadyside.
translation.ja: グッドを殺せば シェイディサイドも

translation.en: Any tips for fighting these things?
- No, Cindy, no! No, no! - Let's go!
Hang her! Hang her! Hang her!
Never seen a goody bag? All cops got 'em, for emergencies.
translation.ja: お楽しみ袋だ 警官が緊急用に持ってる

translation.en: Full of useful stuff. There was this one ti…
translation.ja: 使える物ばかりだ　これも…

translation.en: I'll tell you again. Somebody planted that.
translation.ja: 言っただろ　ハメられたんだ
そうだな　これは⸺ 僕のだ

translation.en: I wanted to see if you wanted one of these, uh… headlamps.
translation.ja: ヘッドランプが 必要かと思って

translation.en: I know it looks pretty dumb, but…
Up, up… down, down. Left, right, left, right, B, A, start.
translation.ja: 上上 下下 左右左右 ＢＡ スタート

translation.en: It's the ultimate secret code. Super Contra, Castlevania, Teenage Mutant…
translation.ja: 隠しコマンドだ いろんなゲームで使える

translation.en: It's a code for extra lives.
translation.ja: 生き延びる確率が上がる

translation.en: When things get bad at school or whatever, it's… it's what I think about,
translation.ja: 学校で嫌なことがあっても これを思い浮かべれば⸺

translation.en: You smell like an androgynous baby.
Everyone says Shadyside sucks because it's full of shitty people,
translation.ja: シェイディサイドは バカにされ

translation.en: that bad things happen here because we're bad,
translation.ja: 私たちが悪いと言われてきた

translation.en: that we deserve what we have coming.
That's how it was for Sarah, and that's how it's been for us.
translation.ja: それでサラも私たちも 苦しんだ

translation.en: OK, just because we're weird and smart and different
translation.ja: 私たちが変人で賢くて 人とは違うからって⸺

translation.en: doesn't mean they can feed us through their meat grinder.
translation.ja: ミンチにされてたまるか

translation.en: It's been three centuries. No one else has gotten this far.
translation.ja: ３世紀が経って やっとここまできた

translation.en: It stops here… tonight. It stops with us.
translation.ja: 今夜で終わりにする 私たちが止める

translation.en: - Be quiet! - Why? There's someone here!

translation.ja: 警察だ　手を上げろ

translation.en: Listen! You don't have any idea what's going on! You're gonna die if you don't listen to me!
translation.ja: 警察は何も分かってない 死にたいの？

translation.en: Stolen vehicle located at Shadyside Mall. Officers scan Shadyside…
translation.ja: シェイディサイド･モールで 盗難車を発見

translation.en: I got two more over here!
Sir, sir, just please let us explain!
- Oh my! Holy… - We gotta go!
OK. I need you to focus because the plan is still on, OK?
translation.ja: しっかりして 計画を実行するの

translation.en: - Wait, wait, wait. You're leaving? - Hold fast.
translation.ja: 待てよ 急いで引いて

translation.en: Stay out of their way. They'll walk right by you.
translation.ja: 進路を塞がなければ 彼らは素通りする
お願いだから気をつけて

translation.en: Oh my God. He's gonna go right by, he's gonna go right by.
translation.ja: 大丈夫だ　素通りする

translation.en: - How many is that? - I got one, Martin got the Milkman.

translation.ja: 骸骨マスクとナイトウィング

translation.en: - I don't know. We need to keep an eye on-- - Y- Y- Yo!
translation.ja: 分からない　監視を… おい！

translation.en: You don't have to do this.
Deena! Get them away from me!
translation.ja: ディーナ　奴らを遠ざけろ
追うんだ　捕まえて

translation.en: Oh God, oh God, oh God! No, no, no!
It's my shirt, it's covered in her blood!
translation.ja: 私の血まみれシャツよ

translation.en: OK, we need a plan B,
We just need more Plan A.
I got that creepy perv motherfucker in the bullseye.
translation.ja: キモい野郎の急所を狙った

translation.en: Now they're dead, but that's not gonna last.
We don't have a lot of time. We have to get ready to fight.
translation.ja: 時間がない 戦う準備をしないと

translation.en: - Wait! - What the hell is that?
At least we still have magic blood.
No, no, no! We can find other weapons!
We can use the delivery hallway, outflank them.
translation.ja: 通路を使って出し抜く

translation.en: - We-- - Or… we can wait it out.
translation.ja: それともここで待つか

translation.en: No, no! No, we're too close!
translation.ja: ダメだ　あり得ない あと一歩だ

translation.en: Too many people have died, I'm not letting them take my sister too!
translation.ja: 大勢 死んだんだ 姉さんは渡さない

translation.en: Solomon forged this place with nothing but words and stone!
translation.ja: ソロモンは言葉と石だけで この場所を作り上げた

translation.en: Awakening this power from the depths of the Earth.
translation.ja: 地の底から闇の力を 目覚めさせたんだよ

translation.en: He extended his hand to the darkness

translation.ja: 300年間 ここは成長してきた

translation.en: And you think you can stop it?
translation.ja: 今さら それを 止められると思うか？
私よ　お願いだから

translation.en: Get off of me! Get off of me! Get off of me!
Shadyside's newest piece of shit makes the front page!
translation.ja: シェイディサイドが また新聞の一面を飾る
“地元のレズ女が 恋人を殺害した”

translation.en: And they're giving me a fucking medal.
The truth shall be your curse.
translation.ja: 真実があなたの呪いとなる

translation.en: I will shadow you for eternity.

translation.ja: 誰かを傷つけるたびに

translation.en: You will feel the grip of my hand.
translation.ja: あなたは私の手を感じるはず

translation.en: I will never let you go.
translation.ja: 決してあなたを 自由にしない

translation.en: All is no longer good in Sunnyvale.
translation.ja: サニーヴェイルの凋落(ちょうらく)です

translation.en: New evidence continues to surface implicating Union County Sheriff Nicholas Goode
translation.ja: ユニオン郡保安官の ニコラス･グッドが⸺

translation.en: The family maintains they had no knowledge of Sheriff Goode's horrifying secret.
translation.ja: 家族は保安官の秘密を 知らなかったとしています

translation.en: No knowledge? What a bunch of dickheads.

translation.ja: すごいな　ありがとう

translation.en: But you know the doctor said I can't have any of… whatever that is.
translation.ja: でも医者の指示だ これは食べられない

translation.en: Are you serious? I made those with ingredients and shit.
translation.ja: 私が作ったのよ　材料からね

translation.en: OK, whatever. Get in the car.

translation.ja: “面接だ　夕食には戻る 父より”

translation.en: - Pick you up later. - You not coming in?
translation.ja: 放課後ね 入らない？

translation.en: Nah, I got something to do.

translation.ja: 〝サイモンとケイト ヘザーを追悼して〞

translation.en: No CDs, no tapes, no skipping. Look, check that out.
translation.ja: 〝サイモンとケイト ヘザーを追悼して〞 ＣＤでもテープでもない 音飛びしない ＣＤでもテープでもない 音飛びしない ＣＤでもテープでもない 音飛びしない 〝人気商品〞 ＣＤでもテープでもない 音飛びしない

translation.en: - It's perfect. - It's bigger than my Discman.
translation.ja: いいだろ 大きすぎる

translation.en: Yeah, you know, but look, it fits all your jams and it's portable.
translation.ja: でも全曲 入れて持ち運べる

translation.en: No. No, it's not. You know what? Fuck it! Y'all have no fucking vision.
translation.ja: 違うよ　まったく 分かってない

translation.en: I'm telling you, man. It's still too big.
You need an SSD. Solid state drive.
translation.ja: ソリッド(Ｓ)･ステート(Ｓ)･ ドライブ(Ｄ)が必要ね

translation.en: Flash compression? It'll help with your, uh, size problems.
translation.ja: フラッシュストレージの 圧縮で小さくできる

translation.en: Find me online if you want to chat.
♪ His teeth as white as snow… ♪
translation.ja: 〝サラ･フィアー シェイディサイドの母〞

translation.en: And we're still here because of her.
translation.ja: 〝サラ･フィアー シェイディサイドの母〞 彼女に助けられた 彼女に助けられた

translation.en: - I'm still here because of you. - ♪ …into a shady place ♪
What? It's true, you were dead without me.
translation.ja: 本当だよ 私のおかげで生きてる
